本件保存 *
51.7. 18 14143
V.C.
SG.
2
CUSA
139
DEPARTMENT OF STATE AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT UNITED STATES AID MISSION TO CHINA
MC- 166
JUL 18 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang Chief, Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: Excess Property
Ref
: Memo. C2-62-2181 dated July 14, 1962
Dear Mr. Chang,
It is noted that you propose that PWB act as the distributor. However, it is the Mission's understanding that SDC was to have first call on such excess property as they could utilize. As it is an internal matter for decision by CUSA, the Mission will not interpose an objection to the organization selected by CUSA to serve as the distributor for this equipment. However, in view of the fact that we have advised the Commanding Officer, U.S. Naval Support Activity, Taipei that we have requirements for the parts enumerated in List No. N-122-62-63044 dated 6-12-62 it now behooves us to remove the same from the yard as expeditiously as possible.
Sincerely yours, Ritaotter
H. T. Potter Supply Advisor
2 商
As M. E- 16,13.2 纯 UX 5,
國史饭 cademia Historica
